verses.verse: וַיִּמְעֲל֧וּ <WH4603> committed בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> But the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel מַ֖עַל <WH4604> a trespass בַּחֵ֑רֶם <WH2764> in the accursed thing וַיִּקַּ֡ח <WH3947> took עָכָ֣ן <WH5912> for Achan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son כַּרְמִי֩ <WH3756> of Carmi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son זַבְדִּ֨י <WH2067> of Zabdi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son זֶ֜רַח <WH2226> of Zerah לְמַטֵּ֤ה <WH4294> of the tribe יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah מִן־ <WH4480> some הַחֵ֔רֶם <WH2764> of the accursed thing וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֥ף <WH639> and the anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בִּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> against the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> men מִֽירִיח֗וֹ <WH3405> from Jericho הָעַ֞י <WH5857> to Ai אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עִם־ <WH5973> which [is] beside בֵּ֥ית אָ֙וֶן֙ <WH1007> Bethaven מִקֶּ֣דֶם <WH6924> on the east side לְבֵֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> of Bethel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and spake אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> and to לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto them saying עֲל֖וּ <WH5927> Go up וְרַגְּל֣וּ <WH7270> and view אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the country וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> went up הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> the men וַֽיְרַגְּל֖וּ <WH7270> and viewed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> Ai

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <WH7725> And they returned אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> to Joshua וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said אֵלָיו֮ <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> nay יַ֣עַל <WH5927> go up כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֒ <WH5971> unto him Let not all the people כְּאַלְפַּ֣יִם <WH505> thousand אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> men א֚וֹ <WH176> or כִּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> but let about two or three אֲלָפִ֣ים <WH505> thousand אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men יַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> go up וְיַכּ֣וּ <WH5221> and smite אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֑י <WH5857> Ai אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּיַגַּע־ <WH3021> to labour שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> [and] make not all the people כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מְעַ֖ט <WH4592> thither for they [are but] few הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> So there went up מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעָם֙ <WH5971> thither of the people שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there כִּשְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> about three אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men וַיָּנֻ֕סוּ <WH5127> and they fled לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> of Ai

וַיַּכּ֨וּ <WH5221> smote מֵהֶ֜ם <WH1992> like אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> And the men הָעַ֗י <WH5857> of Ai כִּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> of them about thirty וְשִׁשָּׁה֙ <WH8337> and six אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֞וּם <WH7291> for they chased לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> them [from] before הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> the gate עַד־ <WH5704> far הַשְּׁבָרִ֔ים <WH7671> [even] unto Shebarim וַיַּכּ֖וּם <WH5221> and smote בַּמּוֹרָ֑ד <WH4174> them in the going down וַיִּמַּ֥ס <WH4549> melted לְבַב־ <WH3824> wherefore the hearts הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> and became לְמָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> and became as water

וַיִּקְרַ֨ע <WH7167> rent יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua שִׂמְלֹתָ֗יו <WH8071> his clothes וַיִּפֹּל֩ <WH5307> and fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנָ֨יו <WH6440> upon his face אַ֜רְצָה <WH776> to the earth לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> until the eventide ה֖וּא <WH1931> he וְזִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> he and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> and put עָפָ֖ר <WH6083> dust עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <WH7218> upon their heads

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֲהָ֣הּ ׀ <WH162> Alas O אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD לָ֠מָה <WH4100> why הֵעֲבַ֨רְתָּ <WH5674> wherefore hast thou at all הַעֲבִ֜יר <WH5674> over אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to deliver אֹתָ֛נוּ <WH853> בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> us into the hand הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites לְהַאֲבִידֵ֑נוּ <WH6> to destroy וְלוּ֙ <WH3863> us? would to God הוֹאַ֣לְנוּ <WH2974> we had been content וַנֵּ֔שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בְּעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

בִּ֖י <WH994> O אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> Lord מָ֣ה <WH4100> what אֹמַ֔ר <WH559> what shall I say אַ֠חֲרֵי <WH310> when אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after הָפַ֧ךְ <WH2015> turneth יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Israel עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> their backs לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> their enemies

וְיִשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> shall hear הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <WH3669> For the Canaanites וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and all the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְנָסַ֣בּוּ <WH5437> [of it] and shall environ us round עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> and וְהִכְרִ֥יתוּ <WH3772> and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמֵ֖נוּ <WH8034> our name מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> from the earth וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> and what תַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> and what wilt thou do לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> our name הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> unto thy great ס

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua קֻ֣ם <WH6965> Get thee up לָ֑ךְ לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why זֶּ֔ה <WH2088> he אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you נֹפֵ֥ל <WH5307> wherefore liest עַל־ <WH5921> and פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> accept

חָטָא֙ <WH2398> hath sinned יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְגַם֙ <WH1571> have also עָבְר֣וּ <WH5674> and they have also transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֔י <WH1285> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <WH6680> which I commanded אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> have even לָֽקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> them for they have even taken מִן־ <WH4480> some הַחֵ֔רֶם <WH2764> of the accursed thing וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> both גָּֽנְבוּ֙ <WH1589> and have also stolen וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> have also כִּֽחֲשׁ֔וּ <WH3584> and dissembled וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> have even שָׂ֥מוּ <WH7760> also and they have put בִכְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3627> [it] even among their own stuff

וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> except יֻכְל֜וּ <WH3201> could בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Therefore the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לָקוּם֙ <WH6965> not stand לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֹיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> their enemies עֹ֗רֶף <WH6203> [their] backs יִפְנוּ֙ <WH6437> [but] turned לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> their enemies כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הָי֖וּ <WH1961> have become לְחֵ֑רֶם <WH2764> because they were accursed לֹ֤א <WH3808> not אוֹסִיף֙ <WH3254> neither will I be with you any more לִֽהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> have become עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> with אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תַשְׁמִ֛ידוּ <WH8045> ye destroy הַחֵ֖רֶם <WH2764> the accursed מִֽקִּרְבְּכֶֽם׃ <WH7130> from among

קֻ֚ם <WH6965> Up קַדֵּ֣שׁ <WH6942> sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say הִתְקַדְּשׁ֣וּ <WH6942> Sanctify לְמָחָ֑ר <WH4279> yourselves against to morrow כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כֹה֩ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> for thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel חֵ֤רֶם <WH2764> [There is] an accursed thing בְּקִרְבְּךָ֙ <WH7130> in the midst יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of thee O Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> thou canst לָקוּם֙ <WH6965> not stand לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> thine enemies עַד־ <WH5704> until הֲסִירְכֶ֥ם <WH5493> until ye take away הַחֵ֖רֶם <WH2764> the accursed thing מִֽקִּרְבְּכֶֽם׃ <WH7130> from among

וְנִקְרַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7126> therefore ye shall be brought בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> In the morning לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7626> according to your tribes וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> shall be that הַשֵּׁבֶט֩ <WH7626> and it shall be [that] the tribe אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִלְכְּדֶ֨נּוּ <WH3920> taketh יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> which the LORD יִקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> shall come לַמִּשְׁפָּח֗וֹת <WH4940> according to the families וְהַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֞ה <WH4940> [thereof] and the family אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which יִלְכְּדֶ֤נָּה <WH3920> shall take יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD תִּקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> shall come לַבָּתִּ֔ים <WH1004> by households וְהַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> and the household אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִלְכְּדֶ֣נּוּ <WH3920> shall take יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> which the LORD יִקְרַ֖ב <WH7126> shall come לַגְּבָרִֽים׃ <WH1397> man

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become הַנִּלְכָּ֣ד <WH3920> And it shall be [that] he that is taken בַּחֵ֔רֶם <WH2764> with the accursed thing יִשָּׂרֵ֣ף <WH8313> shall be burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> with fire אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֑וֹ כִּ֤י <WH3588> because עָבַר֙ <WH5674> he and all that he hath because he hath transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> and because עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> and because he hath wrought נְבָלָ֖ה <WH5039> folly בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֤ם <WH7925> rose up early יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> So Joshua בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיַּקְרֵ֥ב <WH7126> and brought אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel לִשְׁבָטָ֑יו <WH7626> by their tribes וַיִּלָּכֵ֖ד <WH3920> was taken שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> and the tribe יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיַּקְרֵב֙ <WH7126> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> the family יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּלְכֹּ֕ד <WH3920> and he took אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> the family הַזַּרְחִ֑י <WH2227> of the Zarhites וַיַּקְרֵ֞ב <WH7126> and he brought אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> the family הַזַּרְחִי֙ <WH2227> of the Zarhites לַגְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1397> man וַיִּלָּכֵ֖ד <WH3920> was taken זַבְדִּֽי׃ <WH2067> and Zabdi

וַיַּקְרֵ֥ב <WH7126> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> his household לַגְּבָרִ֑ים <WH1397> man וַיִּלָּכֵ֗ד <WH3920> was taken עָכָ֞ן <WH5912> and Achan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son כַּרְמִ֧י <WH3756> of Carmi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son זַבְדִּ֛י <WH2067> of Zabdi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זֶ֖רַח <WH2226> of Zerah לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to עָכָ֗ן <WH5912> unto Achan בְּנִי֙ <WH1121> My son שִֽׂים־ <WH7760> give נָ֣א <WH4994> implore כָב֗וֹד <WH3519> I pray thee glory לַֽיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְתֶן־ <WH5414> and make ל֣וֹ תוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> confession וְהַגֶּד־ <WH5046> unto him and tell נָ֥א <WH4994> now לִי֙ מֶ֣ה <WH4100> what עָשִׂ֔יתָ <WH6213> me now what thou hast done אַל־ <WH408> not תְּכַחֵ֖ד <WH3582> hide מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

וַיַּ֧עַן <WH6030> answered עָכָ֛ן <WH5912> And Achan אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> Joshua וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said אָמְנָ֗ה <WH546> Indeed אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I חָטָ֙אתִי֙ <WH2398> I have sinned לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְכָזֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise וְכָזֹ֖את <WH2063> I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <WH6213> and thus and thus have I done

[וָאֶרְאֶה כ] (וָאֵ֣רֶא <WH7200> advise self ק) בַשָּׁלָ֡ל <WH7998> among the spoils אַדֶּ֣רֶת <WH155> garment שִׁנְעָר֩ <WH8152> Babylonish אַחַ֨ת <WH259> a טוֹבָ֜ה <WH2896> goodly וּמָאתַ֧יִם <WH3967> and two hundred שְׁקָלִ֣ים <WH8255> shekels כֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> of silver וּלְשׁ֨וֹן <WH3956> wedge זָהָ֤ב <WH2091> of gold אֶחָד֙ <WH259> and a חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> of fifty שְׁקָלִים֙ <WH8255> shekels מִשְׁקָל֔וֹ <WH4948> weight וָֽאֶחְמְדֵ֖ם <WH2530> then I coveted וָֽאֶקָּחֵ֑ם <WH3947> them and took וְהִנָּ֨ם <WH2009> and behold טְמוּנִ֥ים <WH2934> them and behold they [are] hid בָּאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> in the earth בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הָאָֽהֳלִ֖י <WH168> of my tent וְהַכֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> and the silver תַּחְתֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH8478> underneath

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> So Joshua מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers וַיָּרֻ֖צוּ <WH7323> and they ran הָאֹ֑הֱלָה <WH168> unto the tent וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold טְמוּנָ֛ה <WH2934> and behold [it was] hid בְּאָהֳל֖וֹ <WH168> in his tent וְהַכֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> and the silver תַּחְתֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH8478> underneath

וַיִּקָּחוּם֙ <WH3947> And they took מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> them out of the midst הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> of the tent וַיְבִאוּם֙ <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> them unto Joshua וְאֶ֖ל <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּצִּקֻ֖ם <WH3332> and laid them out לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> with him took יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> עָכָ֣ן <WH5912> Achan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זֶ֡רַח <WH2226> of Zerah וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> and the silver וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַדֶּ֣רֶת <WH155> and the garment וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> and the wedge הַזָּהָ֡ב <WH2091> of gold וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֡יו <WH1121> and his sons וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתָ֡יו <WH1323> and his daughters וְאֶת־ <WH853> שׁוֹרוֹ֩ <WH7794> and his oxen וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֹר֨וֹ <WH2543> and his asses וְאֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנ֤וֹ <WH6629> and his sheep וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> אָהֳלוֹ֙ <WH168> and his tent וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֔וֹ וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and all Israel עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> and they וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> and all that he had and they brought אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> עֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> them unto the valley עָכֽוֹר׃ <WH5911> of Achor

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> And Joshua מֶ֣ה <WH4100> Why עֲכַרְתָּ֔נוּ <WH5916> hast thou troubled יַעְכֳּרְךָ֥ <WH5916> shall trouble יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> us? the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> thee this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיִּרְגְּמ֨וּ <WH7275> stoned אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> כָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And all Israel אֶ֔בֶן <WH68> him with stones וַיִּשְׂרְפ֤וּ <WH8313> and burned אֹתָם֙ <WH853> בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> them with fire וַיִּסְקְל֥וּ <WH5619> after they had stoned אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בָּאֲבָנִֽים׃ <WH68> them with stones

וַיָּקִ֨ימוּ <WH6965> And they raised עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> over גַּל־ <WH1530> heap אֲבָנִ֣ים <WH68> of stones גָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> over him a great עַ֚ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this וַיָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> turned יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> So the LORD מֵחֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> from the fierceness אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> of his anger עַל־ <WH5921> over כֵּ֠ן <WH3651> after that קָרָ֞א <WH7121> was called שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> Wherefore the name הַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> of that place הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he עֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> The valley עָכ֔וֹר <WH5911> of Achor עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this פ
